AbstractComponent - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model, completing the component virtual machine with operations dealing with individual components.
AbstractComponent(int, int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component if both nbThreads and nbSchedulableThreads are both zero, and an active one with nbThreads non schedulable thread and nbSchedulableThreads schedulable threads otherwise.

create a passive component if both nbThreads and nbSchedulableThreads are both zero, and an active one with nbThreads non schedulable thread and nbSchedulableThreads schedulable threads otherwise.

AbstractCVM(boolean) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
create and initialise the CVM, tagged as distributed if the parameter is true, and as local otherwise; note however that distributed CVM must be created as subclasses of the class AbstractDistributedCVM, so this constructor should never be called directly but only through the other constructor of this class or through one of the constructors of AbstractDistributedCVM.

AcceleratedClock - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks
The class AcceleratedClock implements a relative clock working on an accelerated time based on the class Instant in parallel with a Unix epoch time underlying system clock; its main purpose is to ease the implementation of time-triggered test scenarios, especially for cyber-physical but also for timed test scenarios in general.
AcceleratedClock(String, double) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock
create an accelerated clock with the given acceleration factor, taking the both start times as now.
AcceleratedClock(String, long, double) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock
create an accelerated clock with the given start time in Unix epoch time in nanoseconds and the given acceleration factor taking the start instant as Instant.ofEpochMilli(unixEpochStartTimeInNanos/1000000).
AcceleratedClock(String, Instant, double) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock
create an accelerated clock with the given start instant and acceleration factor, taking the start time in Unix epoch time as now.
AcceleratedClock(String, long, Instant, double) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock
create an accelerated clock with the given start time in Unix epoch time in nanoseconds, start instant and acceleration factor.
accelerationFactor - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock
acceleration factor between durations in Unix epoch system time and durations between instants.

AsyncCallResultReceptionCI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall
The component interface AsyncCallResultReceptionCI defines the method used to send the result of an asynchronous call to the caller real time component.
AsyncCallResultReceptionConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.connections
The class AsyncCallResultReceptionConnector implements a connector for the AsyncCallResultReceptionCI component interface.

AsyncCallServerPlugin - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall
The class AsyncCallServerPlugin implements a protocol to be called asynchronously by another component to which the result is sent back using another asynchronous call.
